experience.title: Orientation cum Selection Camp (OCSC) 2017, Physics
experience.description: Orientation cum Selection Camp, Physics, was organised by HBCSE to train 34 students from all over India who had qualified Indian National Physics Olympiad, 2017. Rigorous training was provided to train them for the International Physics Olympiad, 2017.
